channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: Kohli's captaincy redefines India's success in Tests
item.description: #Crickit | 5 years to the day since #ViratKohli became India's most successful Test captain (via CrickIt) 5 years to the day since Virat Kohli became India's most successful Test captain.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut jokes her 'hone wale saas-sasur' ran away when she was summoned by police
item.description: #KanganaRanaut opened up about facing hurdles as she spoke about her romantic relationships Kangana Ranaut clarified she was 'just lying' after she said her prospective in-laws 'ran away' from her house after she was summoned in a case.

item.title: 7 best morning detox water recipes for clear skin
item.description: Are you looking for natural ways to get clear and glowing skin? Here are some effective detox water recipes you can try! Are you looking for natural ways to get clear and glowing skin? Here are some effective detox water recipes you can try!
